description: Looking for processes spawned by web server components that indicate reconnaissance by popular public domain webshells for whether perl, python or wget are installed. Author: Cian Heasley. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Webshell Recon Detection Via CommandLine & Processes
query: ((process.parent.executable:(*\\apache* OR *\\tomcat*) OR process.parent.executable:(*\\w3wp.exe OR *\\php\-cgi.exe OR *\\nginx.exe OR *\\httpd.exe)) AND (process.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:(*perl\ \-\-help* OR *python\ \-\-help* OR *wget\ \-\-help* OR *perl\ \-h*)))
